definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

pinyin: jia3 ji1 an1 fei1 ta1 ming4

sentences.english: Water-soluble carboxymethyl chitosan was prepared from dried shrimp shells.
sentences.chinese: 以虾壳为原料，制备了水溶性羧甲基壳聚糖。

sentences.english: Objective Identification of methyl-dopa to improve the methods.
sentences.chinese: 目的对甲基多巴鉴别改进方法。

sentences.english: Hydrolysis and oxidation of the flocculant is the direct cause for the formation of methylmercury.
sentences.chinese: 麸皮的水解和氧化是甲基汞生成的直接原因。

sentences.english: The growth curve was drawn by the method of methyl-thiazol-tetrazolium (MTT).
sentences.chinese: 四甲基偶氮唑盐法绘制生长曲线。

sentences.english: One group ate food with 0.3 parts per million (ppm) methylmercury, which most U.
sentences.chinese: 第一组吃的食物中，甲基水银含量是千万分之三。

sentences.english: In this paper, p-methylphenyl sulphonylamine was used to modify urea formaldehyde resin with low molar ratio.
sentences.chinese: 用对甲基苯磺酰胺改性低克分子比的脲醛树脂。

sentences.english: He had in fact intentionally used crystal methylene.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他曾刻意服用晶体甲基。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the factors that influenced the liquefaction of benzylated wood were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 此外，考察了影响苯甲基化木材溶液化的各种因素。

sentences.english: Normal development was restored upon inhibition of the DNA demethylase system.
sentences.chinese: 可通过抑制DNA去甲基酶系统来修复正常的发育。

sentences.english: Trimethylphosphine forms the more stable complexes .
sentences.chinese: 三甲基膦形成更稳定的化合物。

sentences.english: Neferine (Nef) is a dibenzylisoquinoline alkaloid isolated from a Chinese medicinal herb ( Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn ).
sentences.chinese: 甲基莲心碱是一种双苄基异喹啉类生物碱。

sentences.english: The chlorination wastewater was treated with circulating, time-delay, aeration process.
sentences.chinese: 采用循环延时曝气工艺处理甲基氯化物废水。

sentences.english: The recovery of added methylmercury was reported to be approximately 90% .
sentences.chinese: 添加的甲基汞的回收率据报到达90左右。

sentences.english: And the drug methylnaltrexone seems to inhibit cancer growth and invasion.
sentences.chinese: 而药物甲基纳曲酮看起来能够阻断肿瘤的生长和入侵。

sentences.english: Replication of methylation patterns by DNA methyltransferases maintains genome stability through cell division.
sentences.chinese: 甲基化作用可以使基因组在细胞分裂过程中保持稳定。

sentences.english: There is a hypermethylation sequential basis in the upstream region from the transcriptional start site of IRX1 gene.
sentences.chinese: IRX1基因转录起始点上游存在高甲基化结构基础。
